danger_files.message: Making changes to the `environments/*.json` files will affect MP AWS accounts, for more information on the impact of these changes read the [documentation](https://user-guide.modernisation-platform.service.justice.gov.uk/user-guide/creating-environments.html#schema).

Making changes to the `environments-networks/*.json` files will affect networking of MP AWS accounts, in particular which VPC/Subnet is being shared in to which environment. For more guidance consult the [documentation](https://user-guide.modernisation-platform.service.justice.gov.uk/runbooks/creating-accounts-for-end-users.html#networking-stage).

Making changes to the `terraform/environments/bootstrap/member-bootstrap/iam.tf` file will alter the IAM permissions for all members on the MP platform, please check the plan carefully before proceeding
